event.title: Python lightning talks
event.description:
A lightning talks session on a variety of topics of interest to Python developers.

So far we have the following possible talks lined up

• Mocking approaches for unit testing (cloud) automation - Ed Crewe 

• Magically run your code faster with PyPy - Ronan Lamy

• PixieDust: an Open Source Library that simplifies and improves Jupyter Python Notebooks - Margriet Groenendijk

•  More Py with Python 3 and mypy - Wuh Orp

Please let me know when you arrive if  you have something you wish to give a talk on today ... see discussion thread on this site at 

https://www.meetup.com/python-dbbug/messages/boards/thread/50275054

Note that the usual pizza and beer should be available for this talks session.
